Docs Site - Product Release Checklist

Overview

This is a checklist for each professional product to ensure that all updates to the docs.rstudio.com site are complete prior to a minor or major release.

Important

This checklist does NOT cover each file that may need to be updated. Instead, the files listed below probably provide content, such as installation commands, that are version-specific and are more likely to require an update for a release.

Workbench

Expand for checklist

Product Configuration Overview table:

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/configuration/
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/blob/master/docs/configuration.md

Requirements: 

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/rsp/requirements/
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/blob/master/docs/rsp/requirements.md

Installation:

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/rsp/installation/
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/blob/master/docs/rsp/installation.md

Upgrade:

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/rsp/upgrade/
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/blob/master/docs/rsp/upgrade.md

Configuration:

Active Directory

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/rsp/configuration/authentication/active-directory/
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/blob/master/docs/rsp/configuration/authentication/active-directory.md

Integration:

Python:

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/rsp/integration/python/
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/blob/master/docs/rsp/integration/python.md

Launcher Slurm:

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/rsp/integration/launcher-slurm/
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/blob/master/docs/rsp/integration/launcher-slurm.md

Support

Rollback

  • URL: https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/360062132513

All Documentation:

Please check the All Versions drop-down and add the most recent version of applicable documentation guides.

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/rsp/documentation
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/blob/master/docs/rsp/documentation.md

Troubleshooting:

  • URL: https://docs.rstudio.com/troubleshooting/launcher-kubernetes/
  • File path: https://github.com/rstudio/docs.rstudio.com/tree/master/docs/troubleshooting
